title: Cup And Saucer, 1976-1-67-a,b
dimensions:
H x diam. (saucer): 2.5 x 12.4 cm (1 x 4 7/8 in.)
H x diam. (cup): 5.6 x 7.9 cm (2 3/16 x 3 1/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of the C. Helme and Alice B. Strater Collection
description: White glass with border around saucer and cup in a continuous arch-shape pattern.  Arches are orange/red with gilt trim.
